description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter application. It builds a UI with a gradient background, a 'Discover' header, a stack of profile cards, and 'Pass' and 'Like' buttons, utilizing imported profile data and custom widgets.
external_methods: Location of methods called within ProfileCard and PrimaryButton, if any

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders the main home screen with profile cards and action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, creating UI elements based on the current theme and profile data.
